gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 120, Pistons 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeated the Pistons, 120-102. Joel Embiid led the way with 37 points, 11 rebounds, and eight assists, while Tobias Harris added 15 points, 12 rebounds, and four assists in the victory. Jaden Ivey tallied 25 points, five rebounds, and four assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The 76ers improve to 45-35, while the Pistons fall to 13-66.
